marklogic.body: Curvy fashionista suggested we give comments if we had been there. It's been 38 years, but I was there. Early months I had the typical Morning sickness, although I admit very mild compared to some, and didn't any and lost a little. I would recommend Weight Watchers! I think I Gained 12 pounds from my starting (pre-pregnancy) weight. Weight Watchers has the healthiest approach especially for pregnancy. Just make sure you get the amount of protein that is recommended by your Dr. and take it easy on the carbs - except for fruit and fresh veggies.
